Job Description

Checking Documents and Drawings :
o
Receive, check and follow the Engineering Documents and Drawings 
as received from the site Engineer 
o
HART and Field Foundation Instrument, P&ID, Instrument Layout, 
Hook up Drawing, Single Line Diagram etc. to be considered for 
installation activities
o
Comment regarding any discrepancy/clashes of the services in the 
drawings related to site condition prior to start of work 

Material Receiving :
o
Check material as received at site as per the Engineering Documents 
o
Notify if any discrepancy in receipt of the 
Materials
o
To make sure that Material are stored safely and secured prior to 
installation 

Calibration:
o
 Calibration of Instruments prior to installation as per Project 
requirement
o
 Instruments such as Flow Transmitter, Pressure Transmitter, Level 
Transmitter etc. to be Calibrated prior to installation
 Installation Activity:
o Installation of Instruments, JBs, IR Panels, PLC and DCS Panels etc. as
per Approved drawings 
o Installation of Instrumentation Cable
o Glanding & Termination of Instruments

Coordination of Testing & Per-Commissioning:
o
Loop Testing
o
Functional Testing
o
Pre-Commissioning 

 Documentation:
o Marking Red Mark Up for changes in Documents and Drawings as per
final site preparation and submit to QC Engineer for review 
o Assist in submission of Documents and Drawings

 Maintenance:
o Monitor Functionally of Installed Instruments as per Project 
specification
o Provide support and maintenance of Installed Instruments and other 
Instrumentation accessories as per Project Specification 
Skills:
Good hand on Lab as well as Field Calibration using 375/475 Field
Communicator, Maintenance and Troubleshooting of 
Differential Pressure type Transmitters including Flow, PDT 
and Level Transmitters as well as on Control Valves of 
different manufactures such as Dresser, Masoneilan and 
Metso Automation.
Loop check Activities:
Able to read ILD and perform Loop Checking from field 
sensing to measuring devices & to Marshaling Cabinet 
sequentially.
SAFETY:
I am fully aware with the safety rules and regulations of the 
company and do total job by safety precautions. I have sound
knowledge about tools and tackles using safety and my self- 
safety.

I do hereby inform that all the statements made above are

Please anticipate your earlier and positive response in the
